alert.note: Alert for Inland Kenedy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 4:43AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Kenedy, northern Jim Hogg and Brooks Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 442 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Realitos to near South Fork Estates. Movement was southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Falfurrias, Hebbronville, Encino, Rachal, Sarita, Gruy Stadium, La Colonia Park, Airport Road Addition, South Fork Estates and Falfurrias Junior High School. This includes the following highways... US Highway 77 between mile markers 712 and 722. US Highway 281 between mile markers 708 and 734. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
